ygData.subject: Fellow gladiator fans, get paid for surfing the web!
ygData.msgSnippet: I figure you guys spend quite a bit of time online so... GET PAID FOR SURFING THE WEB!! Have you heard about ALL-ADVANTAGE? This is not another one of those
ygData.rawEmail:
X-Digest-Num: 54
Message-ID: <17248.54.138.959279670@...>
Date: 5 Nov 1999 03:09:27 -0000
From: dimento@...
Subject: Fellow gladiator fans, get paid for surfing the web!

I figure you guys spend quite a bit of time online so...
GET PAID FOR SURFING THE WEB!! Have you heard about ALL-ADVANTAGE?

This is not another one of those money scams or lame attempts at 
getting you to spend money or purchase some sort of membership.

Instead, this is a simple way to make money. A company by the name
of ALL-ADVANTAGE actually pays you to surf the web!

Of course, I'm informing you of this online community in order to 
make some money myself since ALL-ADVANTAGE pays you for
referring people as well.

Simply go to http://www.alladvantage.com to read all about it.
If convinced, go ahead and join the growing community. Be sure to 
enter EHS-905 as your referral ID.

So once again, get paid to surf the web! Please remember to insert
EHS-905 as your referral ID (I get some money out of it too).

Now go make some money!!!
